mapper.sql:
from users m where 1 = 1 and m.id = #{id} and instr(m.username, #{username}) > 0
and m.create_datetime >= CONCAT('${createTimeStart}', ' 00:00:00')
and m.create_datetime <= CONCAT('${createTimeEnd}', ' 23:59:59')
mapper.select: select id as "id", username as "username", password as "password", salt as "salt", create_datetime as "createDatetime"
